magpie.data.utilities.normalizers

Class ZScoreNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.utilities.normalizers.BaseDatasetNormalizer
      • magpie.data.utilities.normalizers.IndependentVariableNormalizer
        • magpie.data.utilities.normalizers.ZScoreNormalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SoftmaxNormalizer

    public class ZScoreNormalizer
extends IndependentVariableNormalizer
    Scale variables by calculating their Z scores. Applies the transformation
    x’ = ( x - mean(X) ) / stdev(X)
    where x is the value of an attribute, X is the set of all values of that variable in the training set, and x’ is the normalized attribute. For examples where the range of X is measured to be 0, the range is assumed to be 1.

    Usage: *No options*

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
